name: When It Comes Crashing Down And You Point At Signs
name_original: When It Comes Crashing Down And You Point At Signs
description:
Click on the logo when it's revealed.

Score points.

Press 'R' to reload at anytime.

Unlock bonus characters. Here's how: http://pastebin.com/9AvQWyC7

Live out your wildest sign-pointing fantasies.
